component.name: Live Background Removal Lite
component.summary: Live Background Removal Lite for OBS Studio
component.description: Live Background Removal Lite is a lightweight and easy-to-use plugin for OBS Studio that allows you to remove the background from your webcam feed without the need for a green screen. It uses advanced AI technology to accurately detect and remove the background, leaving you with a clean and professional look.

ul.li: ✨ Plugin Renamed: The plugin is now "Live Background Removal Lite" everywhere. All references, file names, documentation, and install paths updated for consistency.
📝 License Upgrade: Now licensed under GPL-3.0-or-later.
📚 Documentation & Demo: README and documentation improved, demo GIF added, all links and instructions updated.
🛠️ Build & Packaging: All manifests and build files updated to match the new name and version. CMake bundleId, website, and metadata updated.
🧩 Codebase Modernization: Copyright and license headers updated, redundant files removed.
🌍 Localization: Plugin and UI labels updated in all supported languages.

description.p: Thank you for supporting Live Background Removal Lite! If you notice anything amiss after this big rename and license change, please open an issue.

ul.li: 🚀 Update Checker Returns! Plugin now checks for new versions and notifies you in the filter UI. Localized status and clear messages.
💨 Selfie Segmenter Performance Boost: Major rewrite, SIMD acceleration (AVX2/NEON), new unit tests, and better maintainability.
🧩 Project Structure Modernization: Core logic reorganized, redundant files removed.
🛠️ CMake & Build Improvements: CMake detects/links curl & backward-cpp, AVX2 triplets, improved test infra.
🌍 Localization & UI Enhancements: Update checker info fully localized, clearer UI messages.
📚 Documentation & Developer Guide Updates: Release/dev guidelines clarified, Copilot/Gemini instructions improved.

description.p: Thank you for using Background Removal Lite! Please report any issues or feedback.
This release adds unofficial Flatpak build instructions, improves documentation, and fixes installer links.

ul.li: Flatpak build instructions added.
Documentation improvements.
Installer link corrections.
Project cleanup.
Arch Linux PKGBUILD & Flatpak metadata updates.
Release process & contributor docs enhanced.

description.p: This release adds support for Arch Linux packaging, includes a new Flatpak manifest, and brings several documentation and workflow improvements.

ul.li: Arch Linux Packaging Support: Added a PKGBUILD for easier building and installation on Arch Linux.
Flatpak Manifest Added: New experimental Flatpak manifests for easier packaging.
Documentation & Readme Improvements: Updated documentation to include Arch Linux instructions.
Workflow Improvements: CI workflow now triggers on both branch and tag pushes.

description.p: This update brings several improvements to build and testing workflows, a cleanup of legacy update checker code, and small quality-of-life fixes for both users and contributors. Major changes include renaming the project to "Background Removal Lite", removing the built-in update checker, and cleaning up the CMake and CI build processes. An unsupported PKGBUILD for Arch Linux has also been added.
